Aluminum 6061-T6.Material Notes: A general purpose, heat treatable aluminum alloy with good formability, weldability, and corrosion resistance.

ABS Plastic, General Purpose.Material Notes: A common thermoplastic polymer known for its impact resistance and toughness.

Titanium Ti-6Al-4V (Grade 5).Material Notes: The most common titanium alloy, known for its high strength-to-weight ratio and corrosion resistance.

PEEK (Polyether Ether Ketone).Material Notes: A high-performance thermoplastic known for its excellent mechanical properties, chemical resistance, and high-temperature stability.

Inconel 718.Material Notes: A precipitation-hardenable nickel-chromium superalloy characterized by high strength, high temperature resistance, and corrosion resistance.

G-10/FR-4 Glass Epoxy Composite.Material Notes: A high-pressure thermoset laminate of woven fiberglass and epoxy resin, valued for its high strength, low moisture absorption, and excellent electrical insulating properties.

Beryllium Copper (C17200).Material Notes: A high-strength copper-based alloy that offers a unique combination of high strength, hardness, conductivity, and corrosion resistance.

Silicone Rubber, General Purpose.Material Notes: A highly versatile elastomer known for its wide service temperature range, flexibility, and resistance to UV, ozone, and moisture.
